ComicInfo.Summary:
The Swamp Thing has just beaten his enemy Arcane after a fight and is trying to find his body. General Sunderland's men are following Liz Tremayne and Dennis Barclay to find The Swamp Thing and trying to kill them, they also have instructions to hunt and kill The Swamp Thing; After some hunt, Sunderland's men finally kills The Swamp Thing but they fail in their attempt to kill Liz and Dennis.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-11-19 06:59:58. [Issue ID 261278]
